website_summaries.verdict: Extremely thin and lightweight laptop that nicely handles basic computing needs.
pros: Runs Chrome OS, so it doesn’t need a lot of processing power
Up to 11 hours of battery life per charge
4GB of RAM is more than you’d expect in this price range
cons: Display only measures 1366x768 resolution, so it’s not quite full-HD quality

customer_reviews.author: Chuck Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this years after getting rid of my late Father's laptop which he had gotten as a retirement gift from his employer back in 2008 and after his passing I used it until it one day wasn't working anymore and I needed a new one, so I got this one and I'm still getting use to it. BTW I'm actually typing this review using this very laptop right now. It's a great laptop for those on a budget but the only thing is that it's only updateable until June 2021 which stinks but oh well.

customer_reviews.title: Great for web browsing and streaming
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my simple needs. I am able to browse the internet, stream videos and basically use it for everyday web searching. I am not a student or business person or tech savvy person. for the $300 that i've spent this is an excellent laptop for me. that being said, Pros: long battery life, I can have multiple chrome tabs open and it does not slow down. Cons: for some reason the apps run slower than if you were to open them in the web browser,, example. the app for PrimeVideo runs a slow compared to going to amazon prime in chrome. enjoy your laptop!
customer_reviews.author: BG15

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition, excellent price arrived fast.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived much quicker than scheduled. It is exactly the same (except for color), as the one I purchased 3 weeks earlier at a large local retailer. There are no scratches, chips, dings or damage of any type. It required charging first before use. It was then put directly to use. My grandson is using it daily to complete his "distance " learning online. I can with confidence recommend this unit, from this source, to anyone trying to help the young people of America keep up with their studying at this time of challenge.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasL

customer_reviews.title: Love My Chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have both transitioned from Windows to Chromebook and we are both very happy. Yes, Chromebook is cloud-based and does not run Windows software, but it is so much faster, cheaper and with much less maintenance than Windows machines require. I recommend getting at least 4GB of RAM unless you are going to be mainly just using it as an internet browser. If you are using it as a laptop replacement - as we are - be aware of the lack of Windows software compatibility and the need for at least 4GB of RAM.
customer_reviews.author: J. Enterkin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this laptop for my daughter for school. We purchased it in June, she started using it in August and it already stopped working and will not power up. We bought the warranty, but apparently you have to be under the warranty for a year before Samsung will replace it. I am not happy with this product. When it was working, the battery power never lasted long and the volume didn’t work with headphones. I would not recommend this product nor will I buy again...after the warranty this laptop was about $500. Save the hassle and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Caffine Thunderstorm

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, but in this case...less

It gets the job done but the awful image is almost distracting. Paying close to $200 should warrant a better screen and image quality. I bought aight unseen. If I had gone into Best Buy and was able to look at it and play with it first, I would not have purchased it. And there are no returns on computers unless it doesn’t work

product_meta.title: Samsung Chromebook 3 11.6-inch HD WLED Intel Celeron 4GB 32GB eMMC Chrome OS Laptop (Charcoal)
product_meta.description: Maximize productivity with this Samsung Chromebook 3 Laptop. The 4GB of RAM and a 1. 6 GHz Intel Celeron processor ensure a smooth multitasking experience, while the 11. 6-inch display enhances viewing, letting you work and play with ease. This power-efficient Samsung Chromebook 3 laptop is designed to last for up to 11 hours on a single charge for peace of mind. Everything at Your fingertipsBuilt-in security features ensure you’re protected from viruses and malware. No setup or long load times—simply log in with a Google account, and you’re in. Navigate your world with Chrome OS. Get the best of Google, Gmail, Maps, Docs and Pics, and back everything up safely in the cloud. Plus, your Chromebook gets free updates automatically, it will only get better. Up For AnythingThe strong design you’d expect from a reliable brand like Samsung. Go ahead and let the kids use it to watch movies during snack time, or keep it in the kitchen without worrying about accidents thanks to a water-resistant keyboard. Stay ChargedA battery that gets up to 11 hours on a single charge means you can view the news over coffee in the morning, check emails at lunch then surf social media after dinner, all without having to recharge. Lightweight Slim DesignWeighing only 2. 54 pounds, its lightweight and slim design makes carrying it from room to room easy. Use it as a traditional notebook.
feature_bullets: Intel atom x5-E8000 4 core processor for multitasking. 4GB memory, 32GB eMMC flash memory.
Typical 1366 x 768 HD resolution. Antireflective finish reduces eyestrain. Energy-efficient LED backlight.
Up to 11 hours battery life on a single charge.
Built-in cloud support. Weighs 2. 6 lbs. and measures 0. 7" thin. HDMI output expands your viewing options
Built-in media reader for simple photo transfer. Built-in HD webcam with microphone
